A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Not as Enjoyable as episode 7\, due to over inflated running time and forced humorous lines that the  director thought would enhance the movie and it fails for the most part. Beautifully shot and well acted except for weird turns by Benicio Del Toro and Laura Dern. Adam Driver plays the villian with great aplomb and the film pays proper tribute to the late Carrie Fisher. I liked it but didn't Love it! 12-21-2017
